Manaphy

#489 Phione #491 Darkrai
  • Contents
  • Info
  • Base stats
  • Evolution chart
  • Pokédex entries
  • Moves learned
  • Sprites
  • Locations
  • Language

Manaphy is a Water type Pokémon introduced in Generation 4. It is known as the Seafaring Pokémon.

Manaphy

Additional artwork

Pokédex data

National № 490
Type Water
Species Seafaring Pokémon
Height 0.3 m (1′00″)
Weight 1.4 kg (3.1 lbs)
Abilities 1. Hydration
Local № 151 (Diamond/Pearl)
151 (Platinum)

Training

EV yield 3 HP
Catch rate 3 (0.4% with PokéBall, full HP)
Base Friendship 70 (normal)
Base Exp. 270
Growth Rate Slow

Breeding

Egg Groups Fairy, Water 1
Gender Genderless
Egg cycles 10 (2,314–2,570 steps)

Evolution chart

  • Manaphy does not evolve.

Manaphy changes

  • In Generation 4, Manaphy has a base experience yield of 215.

Pokédex entries

Diamond Born on a cold seafloor, it will swim great distances to return to its birthplace.
Pearl Water makes up 80% of its body. This Pokémon is easily affected by its environment.
Platinum It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.
HeartGold
SoulSilver		 It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of Pokémon.
Black
White
Black 2
White 2		 It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.
